channel.title: [Devo 2.7] Multi-Combat NPC. [PLEASE HELP!]
channel.description:
Source Used: Final Devolution 2.7
Alright, so here's the issue. I have a boss that I want to incorporate into the game, the Jungle Demon. I want this boss to be multi-combat so anyone can attack at the same time, but I can't figure out how to do this.
Currently if another player is attacking it simply states, "This monster is already under attack."
[b]Summary[/b]: How do I allow the Monster to be attacked by more than one person?

item.title: [Devo 2.7] Multi-Combat NPC. [PLEASE HELP!]
item.dc:creator: @Fade_Away Fade Away
item.description:
@Fade_Away wrote:

Source Used: Final Devolution 2.7

Alright, so here’s the issue.
I have a boss that I want to incorporate into the game, the Jungle Demon. I want this boss to be multi-combat so anyone can attack at the same time, but I can’t figure out how to do this.

Currently if another player is attacking it simply states,
“This monster is already under attack.”

Summary:
How do I allow the Monster to be attacked by more than one person?

Read full topic
